title: Learning Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Inquiry-Based Differential Equation Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of calculus and linear algebra
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explore and explain the modeling process of differential equations in real-life problem situations.
Through collaborative learning, learners can establish and implement problem-solving strategies based on a conceptual understanding of differential equations.
Learners can experiment with numerical approaches to solving differential equations using digital tools (e.g., smartphone-based apps).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
